Message:
When I came to,
I was alone in the graveyard,

and had these two things
growing out of my head.

Strangely, I felt Laila’s
warmth around me,
and softly laughed to myself.

The villagers that were
surrounding my house
were all long gone.

All that remained were
ruins of houses that had
once made up this village...
and bodies that had
yet to be buried.

A village no one
would come to anymore...
and a bunch of people
who would slowly be forgotten...

Who’s going to send them off?
Who’s going to watch over them?

What had to be done
was in plain sight—

Do what a gravekeeper
needs to do.
